titles.title: Taxpayer Privacy Protection Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the disclosure information by tax return preparers to third party entities and to prohibit private tax collection contracts.
Taxpayer Privacy Protection Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Taxpayer Privacy Protection Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) prohibit tax return preparers from disclosing income tax return information to another tax return preparer or to a contractor of a tax return preparer; and (2) repeal the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into qualified tax collection contracts.
